1577650907_1NZftAz9VSawGF5JgMYGFv4ByoKEa.body:
You should ask your doctor to reset your antidepressant therapy...probably the dosage or the drug that you're assuming is no longer the right one (you begin to take it in 2018, maybe during 2 years you brain changed and because of this you must change the therapy or the dosage). Probably is a problem that the specialist can fix easily :)

Anyway i suggest you to don't take any action without asking your doctor.. a rapid interrumption of antidepressand therapy can have serious side effect! 

I see that many people in that platform ask for medical advices. I'm a doctor in my real life and i'm asking if i can be useful here. Surely here i can't give specific medical advices (for example drug prescriptions) because behind a monitor i can't visit the patient... but maybe i can help people that want to talk with someone but for any reason can't in other way (blame, no trust, censor, etc...) or want generic informations about a disease, a drug or about asking a specialist. Can be a good idea if i wil open a specific zerotalk? This probably will be the first medical service on zeronet! (not different from others similar in clearweb and darknets)

1578817237_1Drej4kKBea1TryGPYfVZgzDxaB71.body:
Taenia eggs can be easily eradicated by cooking or freezing the meat and the diagnosis can be easily done with a microscope or by observing parasite in feces (but often the illnesss don't give any symptom). Systemic cistercosis occurs when a patient eat food contaminated by eggs (from its feces) and are very frequent in HIV+ patients. The illness can be easily cured by using some specific drugs or by surgery if they don't work.

Please, do not make unnecessary alarmism.  Fasting and changing internal pH are useless against taenia!

this parasite come always from pork meat because the pig is the intermediate host of the tapeworm

1584570227_1Kzonk6v6ccFT3adLkCHoKJhGnoW1.body:
I'm a nuclear medicine physician.  i follow decentralized networks from early 2000 when i was 20 and i knew about decentralized websites by p2p forums. The first project of this type that i followed was osiris - serverless portal system, but its development was stopped in 2011. Now i hope with ZeroNet to rebuild a real internet based on people instead of profit,  filter bubbles, shadow bans and censored social network... a place where everyone can talk freely and where cooperation exist instead competition, as in file sharing P2P networks and as it was in the early internet created by academics. I hope also that decentralized websites will help research by creating a new "peer-revew" based on P2P network instead the centralized scientific journals, that close literature access to the public, dictate what should be published and what not using marketing criteria and hinder data sharing from researchers posing one against each others for funding.

Here i manage a seedbox and a proxy for clearnet under the name of "zeroseed" to help to reach these objectives by increasing the numbers of nodes in the network and allow big files sharing and HD streaming on IFS (i created this second account to by-pass the limit on zerotalk)
